Much gratitude to the  Center for Long-Term Cybersecurity  for selecting CELSO. So proud of our team at  Driven Arts Collective . Looking forward to the journey ahead.   See More The Center for Long-Term Cybersecurity (CLTC) is proud to announce the winners of our 2021 Cybersecurity Arts Contest. Center for Long-Term Cybersecurity May 12 at 10:59 AM  ·  In the latest episode of the Business of Government Hour podcast,  UC Berkeley  researchers Alison Post and Alexandra Pan discuss  # SmartCity   # cybersecurity  risks and resources for local public agencies to make informed choices about adopting these technologies. Listen here or wherever you listen to podcasts! What is “smart cities” technology? Do all smart city technologies pose equivalent cybersecurity risks?
